name: Kist Kizz Ginger Beer
description: For those who enjoy the natural things in life, we give you Kist - Kizz GB with natural ginger extract. The fizz is to revive your mood and the sting of natural ginger is to kick-up your appetite. It's fun to have Kizz GB just as it is too. No artificial flavours or colours added. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
